description:
It does what it should but I miss proper menus cf XFCE's terminal emulator which I feel offers a better UI even on a PinePhone running Phosh. I was unable to copy text from KC so have uninstalled it.

Really unfortunate choice of name given the King's Cross fire in 1987 which proved to be terminal for 31 people and life changing for many more people. 

Please change the name. Thanks.

See https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/King%27s_Cross_fire
summary: Works as it should but an unfortunate choice of name
